resources.string: The Rachel Nash Jerusalem Comprehensive Breast Clinic

The Rachel Nash Jerusalem
Comprehensive Breast Clinic

Bet Ofer
5 Nachum Heftzadi St.
Jerusalem, 95484, Israel
"THE COMPREHENSIVE MODEL PIONEERED BY HALA REPRESENTS A TRUE REVOLUTION IN PATIENT CARE."
Head of National Council of Women\'s Health
Susan G. Comen for the Cure
Hala\'s mission is to save lives. How?
By providing the most advanced, comprehensive breast cancer screening and diagnostic center in Israel.
By giving women the necessary exams in one place, at one time, with on-the- spot results. If non-surgical needle biopsies are performed, results are generally back within days, not weeks.
By detecting breast cancer at its earliest stages, before it\'s too late to treat effectively.
By expanding the Center to include a wider range of services and significantly increase capacity.
Hala is Israel\'s only non-profit comprehensive breast screening diagnostic clinic.
Hala is committed to providing a new level of diagnostic expertise in the field of breast cancer detection
At Hala, all exams and procedures are conducted in one visit.
At Hala, exam results, other than biopsy, are given to the patient on the spot.
Hala has an unsurpassed detection rate of 98.7%.
Hala\'s detection rate is a 31% increase from non-comprehensive models.
Hala has reduced false positives (incorrect diagnoses resulting in unnecessary surgery) by 48%.
Hala uses the world\'s most advanced technology to detect irregularities.
Hala is the only breast screening center in Israel with a 3D Tomosynthesis and C-View system.
Hala\'s specialists consistently catch the 20% of early-stage tumors that are impossible to detect with conventional film techniques.
Hala\'s doors are open to every woman, regardless of social status, race, religion or financial status.
Hala is internationally recognized as an innovator in breast cancer detection.
Hala performs beta testing for companies from Israel and abroad who are creating state-of-the-art breast imaging and cancer identification technologies.
Hala has screened over 150,000 women in the Middle East over the past 15 years.
